thread.section_title: LeaversHoodies.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.leavershoodies.com
thread.title: Lauren Georg

author: Lauren Georg
title: Lauren Georg
text: When I first sent an e-mail, leavershoodies were quick to put menin touch with Faye, who would take care lf my order independently. She immediatly got the design that we were going for and was quick to respond. The hoodies are great quality, the embroidery is well done and the manufacturing of them was quick and effective. Would highly recommend this company if you're looking to produce big batches of customises hoodies.
